TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed RegistrationHelperTx extends System.EnterpriseServices.ServicedComponent
Public NotInheritable Class RegistrationHelperTx Inherits ServicedComponent

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The RegistrationHelperTx class has been deprecated.")

Docs.summary: Used by the .NET Framework infrastructure to install and configure assemblies in the COM+ catalog while maintaining a newly established transaction.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.TransactionAttribute> class attribute is applied to the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.RegistrationHelperTx> class, with a parameter of the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.TransactionOption.RequiresNew> field.
This type does not need to be used directly from your code. Instead, use the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.RegistrationHelper> class.

Docs.summary: Installs the named assembly in the COM+ catalog using transactional semantics

MemberSignature.Value: public void InstallAssembly (string assembly, ref string application, ref string tlb, System.EnterpriseServices.InstallationFlags installFlags, object sync);
.method public hidebysig instance void InstallAssembly(string assembly, string& application, string& tlb, valuetype System.EnterpriseServices.InstallationFlags installFlags, object sync) cil managed
Public Sub InstallAssembly (assembly As String, ByRef application As String, ByRef tlb As String, installFlags As InstallationFlags, sync As Object)
public: void InstallAssembly(System::String ^ assembly, System::String ^ % application, System::String ^ % tlb, System::EnterpriseServices::InstallationFlags installFlags, System::Object ^ sync);
member this.InstallAssembly : string * * * System.EnterpriseServices.InstallationFlags * obj -> unit

Docs.param: The file name of the assembly to install.
Either the name of the COM+ application to install into or .
Either the name of the output Type Library Exporter (Tlbexp.exe) file or .
A bitwise combination of the installation flags values.
A synchronization object generated by the infrastructure that can wait until the specified assembly has been configured in the COM+ catalog.
Docs.summary: Installs the named assembly in the COM+ catalog using transactional semantics.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.RegistrationHelperTx.InstallAssembly%2A> method does not need to be called directly from your code. Instead, call the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.RegistrationHelper.InstallAssembly%2A> method with the same parameters except object sync.
This method requires the caller to have administrative privileges on the local computer.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Under certain circumstances, the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.RegistrationHelperTx.InstallAssemblyFromConfig%2A> method is called from within the .NET Framework infrastructure. It does not need to be called directly from your code. Instead, call the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.RegistrationHelper.InstallAssemblyFromConfig%2A> method.
This method requires the caller to have administrative privileges on the local computer.
